segments.text: Hi , Francis , how was your business trip ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , the business trip itself was very successful . We arrived on time , we had nice conversations and we settled some important issues for the next year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds quite fruitful , why do you call it still a nightmare then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the air line lost my luggage on the return flight and then I lost my carry on bag when I was tackling with the officers in charge . I left the airport three hours later than I expected and then I was caught in a traffic jam . When I finally got home , I was totally exhausted . But I found the elevator was out of service due to a blackout .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is really a sad story . Did they trace back your luggage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am still waiting for their call .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take it easy , all sufferings have their reward .
segments.speaker: S1
